name: Good Goods Incorporated
description:
Good Goods Incorporated is a cute logistics tycoon game set on Earth. You're the CEO of a small company that buy and sells goods. Your goal is to make a lot of money! Trade steel, food, gold and water and ship them around to meet supply and demand.

Features

  • 1+ hrs of playtime
  • Use boats, airplanes and delivery vans to ship your goods all around the world
  • Start on a different place on Earth every time, every playthrough is different!
  • Golden airplanes!


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
